name: iro-library-management
description: Library Management System for Islamic Research Organization

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:user-site && npm run setup:admin-site
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:user-site" "npm run dev:admin-site"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:user-site && npm run build:admin-site
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:user-site" "npm run start:admin-site"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:user-site && npm run lint:admin-site

author: IRO Development Team
